meanings.definition: A mistake in calculating or estimating.
meanings.sent1: Her misreckoning of the time made her late for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The misreckoning in the budget led to financial difficulties.
meanings.sent3: The misreckoning in the recipe resulted in a cake that tasted like soap.
meanings.sent4: His misreckoning of her intentions left him feeling lost and confused.
meanings.sent5: The misreckoning of the distance caused them to take the wrong turn.

meanings.definition: A failure to understand or interpret correctly.
meanings.sent1: The misreckoning of the instructions led to a botched DIY project.
meanings.sent2: His misreckoning of her feelings caused unnecessary conflict.
meanings.sent3: The misreckoning of the map made them wander in circles for hours.
meanings.sent4: Their misreckoning of the situation resulted in an awkward misunderstanding.
meanings.sent5: The misreckoning of the foreign language left them unable to communicate effectively.
